information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/atom/language-c/blob/master/grammars/c.cson
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: Ino

patterns.begin:
(?x)
(?:
  ^ |                  # beginning of line
  (?:(?<!else|new|=))  # or word + space before name
)
((?:[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*::)*+~[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*) # actual name
\s*(\()              # opening bracket
patterns.name: meta.function.destructor.cpp

patterns.begin:
(?x)
(?:
  ^ |                  # beginning of line
  (?:(?<!else|new|=))  # or word + space before name
)
((?:[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*::)*+~[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*) # actual name
\s*(\()              # opening bracket
patterns.name: meta.function.destructor.prototype.cpp

patterns.begin:
(?x)
^\s* ((\#)\s*define) \s+    # define
((?<id>[a-zA-Z_$][\w$]*))      # macro name
(?:
  (\()
    (
      \s* \g<id> \s*         # first argument
      ((,) \s* \g<id> \s*)*  # additional arguments
      (?:\.\.\.)?            # varargs ellipsis?
    )
  (\))
)?
patterns.name: meta.preprocessor.macro.c

patterns.match:
(?x)
(?:
  (?:
    (?=\s)(?<!else|new|return)
    (?<=\w) \s+  # or word + space before name
  )
)
(
  (?:[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*+ | :: )++   # actual name
  |
  (?:(?<=operator) (?:[-*&<>=+!]+ | \(\) | \[\]))
)
\s*(\() # opening bracket
patterns.name: meta.initialization.c

patterns.match:
(?x) %
(\d+\$)?                           # field (argument #)
[#0\- +']*                          # flags
[,;:_]?                              # separator character (AltiVec)
((-?\d+)|\*(-?\d+\$)?)?          # minimum field width
(\.((-?\d+)|\*(-?\d+\$)?)?)?    # precision
(hh|h|ll|l|j|t|z|q|L|vh|vl|v|hv|hl)? # length modifier
[diouxXDOUeEfFgGaACcSspn%]           # conversion type
patterns.name: constant.other.placeholder.c

patterns.begin:
(?x)
(?:^\s*)  # beginning of line
((?!while|for|do|if|else|switch|catch|enumerate|r?iterate)[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_:]*) # actual name
\s*(\()  # opening bracket
patterns.name: meta.function.constructor.cpp
